title: Warm Clothes for Rural Families
description: Help rural families in the Rajshahi division stay warm this winter by donating coats, sweaters, and blankets.

title: Winter Aid for Low-Income Communities
description: Support low-income families in the Dhaka division by providing essential winter clothing.

title: Blanket Drive for Sylhet Villages
description: Donate blankets and sweaters to remote villages in the Sylhet division.

title: Coat Collection for Chattogram Hills
description: Provide warmth to the communities in the Chattogram Hill Tracts by donating winter coats.

title: Helping the Elderly in Rangpur
description: Join us in providing winter clothing to elderly individuals in the Rangpur division.

title: Sweater Campaign for Barishal Fishermen
description: Support the fishermen in Barishal with warm sweaters and jackets during the winter season.
